refnamediv.refpurpose: run program without waiting for it

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: background runs subprogram as a child process (not a process group leader) and then exits without waiting for subprogram to finish.

refsection.title: History
refsection.para: background was originally part of DanielJ.Bernstein's ptyget toolset in 1996.

refsection.title: Author
refsection.para: Original code and documentation by DanielJ.Bernstein. Documentation modernizations by Jonathande Boyne Pollard.
